items.sentence: Tom told Mary that he had seen John in January.
Tom told Mary that she needed to eat something.
Tom\'s apartment is small, but it\'s very cozy.
Tom is three years younger than you, isn\'t he?
I understand exactly what Tom is going through.
I didn\'t know how to deal with that situation.
I didn\'t want to spend any more time with Tom.
I don\'t think Tom has anything to worry about.
Don\'t you think it\'s strange Tom isn\'t here?
Let\'s talk to Tom and find out what he thinks.
